Body:
fig = output_plots.inequality_plot(base_tpi, base_params, reform_tpi=
    reform_tpi, reform_params=reform_params, ineq_measure=ineq_measure,
    pctiles=pctiles, plot_type=plot_type)
assert fig
pytest.mark.parametrize(
    'base_tpi,base_params,reform_tpi, reform_params,ineq_measure,' +
    'pctiles,plot_type', [(base_tpi, base_params, None, None, 'gini', None,
    'levels'), (base_tpi, base_params, reform_tpi, reform_params, 'gini',
    None, 'levels'), (base_tpi, base_params, reform_tpi, reform_params,
    'var_of_logs', None, 'diff'), (base_tpi, base_params, reform_tpi,
    reform_params, 'pct_ratio', (0.9, 0.1), 'levels'), (base_tpi,
    base_params, reform_tpi, reform_params, 'top_share', 0.01, 'pct_diff')],
    ids=['Just baseline', 'Baseline + Reform',
    'Base + Refore, var logs, diff', 'Base + Refore, pct ratios',
    'Base + Refore, top share, pct diff'])
